tagline: My personal fork of the Montage framework.
name: Montage
body: Montage is an application framework powered by standard web technologies. Montage simplifies the development of rich HTML5 applications by providing modular components, real-time two-way data binding, CommonJS dependency management, and many more conveniences. Montage opens a world of opportunity that is only just now available for web developers.
